ExtensionManifest.Author: Willem van Vliet and Tjibbe van der Laan
ExtensionManifest.Legal: Made by the OLO 2014. For internal use withing Twente Acadamy only.
ExtensionManifest.Abstract:
Changelog delta since 0.4.4 Fixed bug in Nemo.jsx while deleting experiment pane. Delete slide means swapping content; program didn't check for type attribute of slide Added support for importing animations from Adobe Edge Animate CC 2.x.x and 3.x.x to due so: Updated jQuery to v2.0.3
Changelog delta since 0.4.2 Fixed animation bug Animation update; check if the user made changes in animation; no changes? do nothing
Changelog delta since 0.4.1 Fixed animation import bug Improved animation import; file has not to be the preloadfile
Changelog delta since 0.4.0 Added checks for Assign animation (is everything selected) Added checks for Add animation (is the selected file a preload file?) Support for multiple animations in one module Improved import of animation (change URL of edge library in edge preload file to js/ instead of animations/../
Changelog delta since 0.3.8 Create duplicate function Bug fixes in updateStay()
Changelog delta since 0.3.7 Bug fixes in addASlide() and setStay() setStay does only work for a select set of elements
Changelog delta since 0.3.6 Bug fixes animation import Added simple debug console
Changelog delta since 0.3.5: Fixed assign animation bug. Fixed add animation function not crating the aniamtions and images directory if they don't exist yet.
Changelog delta since 0.3.4: Fixed bug with animation which have a space in the name.
Changelog delta since 0.3.3: Delete button in the slideContainer instead of a context-menu.
Changelog delta since 0.3.2: Added the Animation tab to the exension. User can add, update and delete animations. Renamed the "Nemo" tab to "Slides" Assigning aniamtions now actually works. Dynamically loading them when viewing in the browser as well!
Changelog delta since 0.3.1: Added Stay-Ghosting Added go to Comment Slide button to extension
